title: Nutriota Alpha Lipoic Acid | 500 mg (180 Capsules)
aboutContent: WHY BUY ACESO ALPHA LIPOIC ACID? - Each capsule contains 500 mg of ALA, which promotes the maintenance of normal blood sugar levels and nerve and nervous system health. This product is suitable for vegans and vegetarians. In addition, with 180 capsules in each pack, which corresponds to a 6 month supply, our product offers you excellent value for money.
descriptionContent: Alpha Lipoic Acid Nutriot 500 mg 180 capsules. High quality and powerful alpha lipoic acid manufactured in facilities that comply with BPF standards. 500 mg alpha lipoic acid in each capsule, 180 capsules in each container. Alpha lipoic acid is a natural compound produced by the human body and used to break down carbohydrates and produce energy for other organs. Our bodies produce very little alpha lipoic acid (ALA) naturally, especially as we get older. But don't worry, as our supplement will help you produce all the ALA your body needs.
ingredientsContent: Alpha lipoic acid, hydroxypropylmethylcellulose (capsule shell), silicon dioxide (anti-caking agent), magnesium stearate (anti-caking agent).
generalInfoContent:
Manufacturer: Nutriota
Package Dimensions: 12.9 x 6.8 x 6.6 cm; 150 g
ASIN: B09NXNVBHZ
